title.text: RFC 4223: Reclassification of RFC 1863 to Historic

contents.text:
Network Working Group                                          P. Savola
Request for Comments: 4223                                     CSC/FUNET
Obsoletes: 1863                                             October 2005
Category: Informational
Reclassification of RFC 1863 to Historic
contents.zh-CHS: 将RFC 1863重新分类为历史

contents.text: Status of This Memo
contents.zh-CHS: 关于下段备忘

contents.text: This memo provides information for the Internet community. It does not specify an Internet standard of any kind. Distribution of this memo is unlimited.
contents.zh-CHS: 本备忘录为互联网社区提供信息。它没有规定任何类型的互联网标准。本备忘录的分发不受限制。

contents.text: Copyright Notice
contents.zh-CHS: 版权公告

contents.text: Copyright (C) The Internet Society (2005).
contents.zh-CHS: 版权所有（C）互联网协会（2005年）。

contents.text: Abstract
contents.zh-CHS: 摘要

contents.text: This memo reclassifies RFC 1863, A BGP/IDRP Route Server alternative to a full mesh routing, to Historic status. This memo also obsoletes RFC 1863.
contents.zh-CHS: 本备忘录将RFC 1863重新分类为历史状态，RFC 1863是BGP/IDRP路由服务器，可替代全网状路由。本备忘录还废除了RFC 1863。

contents.text: 1. Reclassification of RFC 1863 to Historic
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 将RFC 1863重新分类为历史

contents.text: RFC 1863 [1] describes the use of route servers as an alternative to BGP/IDRP full mesh routing.
contents.zh-CHS: RFC 1863[1]描述了使用路由服务器作为BGP/IDRP全网状路由的替代方案。

contents.text: In the context of this document, the term "RFC 1863 route server" is used to refer to a route server as specified in RFC 1863. Other uses of the term "route server" are outside the scope of this document.
contents.zh-CHS: 在本文件的上下文中，术语“RFC 1863路由服务器”用于指RFC 1863中指定的路由服务器。术语“路由服务器”的其他用途不在本文档范围内。

contents.text: Implementations of RFC 1863 route servers do not exist and are not used as an alternative to full mesh routing. Therefore, RFC 1863 is reclassified to Historic status.
contents.zh-CHS: RFC1863路由服务器的实现不存在，也没有用作全网状路由的替代方案。因此，RFC1863被重新归类为历史地位。

contents.text: Current techniques that serve as an alternative to full mesh routing include BGP Route Reflectors [2], BGP Confederedations [3], and the use of private AS numbers. IDRP for IP has never been standardized by the IETF and can be considered obsolete.
contents.zh-CHS: 作为全网状路由的替代方案的当前技术包括BGP路由反射器[2]、BGP确认[3]和使用专用as号码。IP的IDRP从未被IETF标准化，可以认为已经过时。

contents.text: Other uses of (non-RFC1863) route servers, rather than as an alternative to full mesh routing as described by RFC 1863, are expected to continue to be used for multiple purposes, but are out of the scope of this memo.
contents.zh-CHS: （非RFC1863）路由服务器的其他用途，而不是作为RFC 1863所述的全网状路由的替代，预计将继续用于多种用途，但不在本备忘录的范围内。

contents.text: 2. Acknowledgements
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 致谢

contents.text: Jeffrey Haas, John Scudder, Paul Jakma, and Yakov Rekhter provided useful background information for the creation of this memo. Scott Bradner, Jeffrey Haas, and Yakov Rekhter provided substantial feedback during the WG last call.
contents.zh-CHS: Jeffrey Haas、John Scudder、Paul Jakma和Yakov Rekhter为创建本备忘录提供了有用的背景信息。斯科特·布拉德纳（Scott Bradner）、杰弗里·哈斯（Jeffrey Haas）和雅科夫·雷克特（Yakov Rekhter）在工作组上次通话中提供了大量反馈。

contents.text: 3. Security Considerations
contents.zh-CHS: 3. 安全考虑

contents.text: Reclassifying RFC 1863 has no security considerations.
contents.zh-CHS: 重新分类RFC1863没有安全考虑。

contents.text: 4. References
contents.zh-CHS: 4. 工具书类

contents.text: 4.1. Normative References
contents.zh-CHS: 4.1. 规范性引用文件

contents.text: [1] Haskin, D., "A BGP/IDRP Route Server alternative to a full mesh routing", RFC 1863, October 1995.
contents.zh-CHS: [1] Haskin，D.，“全网状路由的BGP/IDRP路由服务器替代方案”，RFC 1863，1995年10月。

contents.text: 4.2. Informative References
contents.zh-CHS: 4.2. 资料性引用

contents.text: [2] Bates, T., Chandra, R., and E. Chen, "BGP Route Reflection - An Alternative to Full Mesh IBGP", RFC 2796, April 2000.
contents.zh-CHS: [2] Bates，T.，Chandra，R.，和E.Chen，“BGP路线反射-全网格IBGP的替代方案”，RFC 2796，2000年4月。

contents.text: [3] Traina, P., McPherson, D., and J. Scudder, "Autonomous System Confederations for BGP", RFC 3065, February 2001.
contents.zh-CHS: [3] Traina，P.，McPherson，D.，和J.Scudder，“BGP自治系统联合会”，RFC 3065，2001年2月。

contents.zh-CHS: 知识产权

Information on the procedures with respect to rights in RFC documents can be found in BCP 78 and BCP 79.

contents.text: Copies of IPR disclosures made to the IETF Secretariat and any assurances of licenses to be made available, or the result of an attempt made to obtain a general license or permission for the use of such proprietary rights by implementers or users of this specification can be obtained from the IETF on-line IPR repository at http://www.ietf.org/ipr.
contents.zh-CHS: 向IETF秘书处披露的知识产权副本和任何许可证保证，或本规范实施者或用户试图获得使用此类专有权利的一般许可证或许可的结果，可从IETF在线知识产权存储库获取，网址为http://www.ietf.org/ipr.

contents.text: The IETF invites any interested party to bring to its attention any copyrights, patents or patent applications, or other proprietary rights that may cover technology that may be required to implement this standard. Please address the information to the IETF at ietf-ipr@ietf.org.
